          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Dates 2</string>
            <string language="en">Dates 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Datiert 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Date 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Data 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Data 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Ημερομηνίαες 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fecha 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you practise both knowledge of international holidays, and how to write them.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you practice both knowledge of international holidays, and how to write them. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">dates</string>
            <string language="sv">international holidays</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">dates</string>
            <string language="en">international holidays</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier üben Sie beides Wissen der internationalen 
Feiertage und wie man sie schreibt. Safir - Englisch und 
Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous pratiquez les deux la connaissance
des vacances internationales, et comment les écrire. Safir - 
l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 2 - combien 
coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você pratica ambo o conhecimento de feriados
internacionais, e como escrevê-los. Safir - vida do inglês e 
de funcionamento para novatos - módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui vi esercitate entrambe nella conoscenza delle 
feste internazionali e come scriverle. Safir - inglese e vita 
attiva per i principianti - modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ ασκείτε και τη γνώση των διεθνών διακοπών, και 
πώς να τους γράψετε. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά 
ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2 - πόσο είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted practica ambo el conocimiento de 
días de fiesta internacionales, y cómo escribirlos. ¿Safir - 
inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 2 - cuánto es
él?</string>
          </description>
